eu.wauz.wauzcore.players

Class WauzPlayerFriends

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.wauz.wauzcore.players.WauzPlayerFriends

  • public class WauzPlayerFriends
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to interact with the friend list of a player.
    Author:
    Wauzmons

      • canAddFriend

        public static boolean canAddFriend(org.bukkit.entity.Player requestingPlayer,
                                   org.bukkit.OfflinePlayer requestedPlayer)
        Checks if a player can add another player as friend.
        Parameters:
        requestingPlayer - The player who wants to send the friend request.
        requestedPlayer - The player that is requested.
        Returns:
        If a friend request is possible.
        See Also:
        getFriendsList(OfflinePlayer)

      • addFriend

        public static boolean addFriend(org.bukkit.entity.Player requestingPlayer,
                                java.lang.String requestedPlayerName)
        Adds a friend to the player's friend list. If no request was sent before, one will be sent and must be confirmed first.
        Parameters:
        requestingPlayer - The player who wants to add a friend.
        requestedPlayerName - The name of the player that is added.
        Returns:
        If the friend was added or a request was sent.
        See Also:
        canAddFriend(Player, OfflinePlayer), getFriendsList(OfflinePlayer), UnicodeUtils.sendChatCommand(Player, String, String, boolean), PlayerConfigurator.setFriendsList(OfflinePlayer, List)

      • removeFriend

        public static void removeFriend(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                org.bukkit.OfflinePlayer friend)
        Removes a friend from the player's friend list. Also tries to send a notification to the unfriended player.
        Parameters:
        player - The player who wants to remove a friend.
        friend - The friend that is removed.
        See Also:
        getFriendsList(OfflinePlayer), PlayerConfigurator.setFriendsList(OfflinePlayer, List)

      • getFriendCount

        public static int getFriendCount(org.bukkit.OfflinePlayer player)
        Gets the number of friends from a player.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to get the friends from.
        Returns:
        The number of friends.
        See Also:
        getFriendsList(OfflinePlayer)

        Returns:
        The list of friend uuids.
